5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: A'isha reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) stood for prayer with a garment which had designs over it. He looked at these designs and after completing the prayer said: Take this garment to Abu Jahm b. Hudhaifa and bring me a blanket for it has distracted me just now

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي ثَوْبٍ لَهُ أَعْلاَمٌ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to offer salat in a garment with markings
